passive.name: Visioscape
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and Energy Regeneration Rate by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer's HP is reduced, all allies' DMG dealt increases by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).\nAt the start of every wave, restores HP to all allies by an amount equal to <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of their respective lost HP.
